title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 25.2 - Appearances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 25.2 - Appearances

State Regulations

The commissioner shall advise the applicant whether or not
the requested opportunity to be heard is granted. (a) If the request is granted, the applicant
shall be advised as to the time and place at which to appear, and the length of
time to be allowed for his appearance. The applicant shall file a written text
of his remarks with the Commissioner of Education at the time of his
appearance. (b) If the request is
not granted, the application may submit a written text of his remarks to the
commissioner by mail. Notes

25.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
